entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 1:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SW 34 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
